nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkJob
SELECT count(*) AS 'Jobs'
WHERE status = 'succeeded'

FROM SparkJob
SELECT count(*) AS 'Jobs'
WHERE status = 'failed'

FROM SparkStage
SELECT count(*) AS 'Stages'
WHERE status = 'complete'

FROM SparkStage
SELECT count(*) AS 'Stages'
WHERE status = 'failed'

FROM SparkTask
SELECT count(*) AS 'Tasks'
WHERE status = 'success'

FROM SparkTask
SELECT count(*) AS 'Tasks'
WHERE status = 'failed'

FROM SparkJob
SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE event = 'start') AS 'Jobs started', filter(count(*), WHERE event = 'complete') AS 'Jobs complete'
LIMIT MAX
TIMESERIES

FROM SparkJob
SELECT average(duration / 1000) AS 'Job duration'
WHERE event = 'complete'
LIMIT MAX
TIMESERIES

SELECT count(*)
FROM (
 FROM SparkJob
 SELECT
  uniqueCount(event) as 'total',
  latest(event) as 'state'
 FACET jobId, description, submissionTime
 ORDER BY max(timestamp)
 LIMIT MAX)
WHERE total = 1 AND state = 'start'
FACET jobId AS 'Job ID', description
LIMIT MAX

SELECT count(*)
FROM (
 FROM SparkStage
 SELECT
  uniqueCount(event) as 'total',
  latest(event) as 'state'
 FACET stageId, jobDescription, firstTaskLaunchedTime
 ORDER BY max(timestamp)
 LIMIT MAX)
WHERE total = 1 AND state = 'start'
FACET stageId AS 'Stage ID', jobDescription
LIMIT MAX

WITH duration / 1000 AS jobDuration FROM SparkJob
SELECT sparkAppName AS Application, jobId AS 'Job ID', description, status, submissionTime, completionTime, completedStageCount AS 'Completed Stages', failedStageCount AS 'Failed Stages', skippedStageCount AS 'Skipped Stages', taskCount
WHERE event = 'complete'
LIMIT MAX
ORDER BY jobDuration DESC

WITH duration / 1000 AS stageDuration FROM SparkStage
SELECT sparkAppName AS Application, stageId AS 'Stage ID', jobDescription, attemptId AS 'Attempt ID', status, firstTaskLaunchedTime, completionTime, completedTaskCount AS 'Completed Tasks', failedTaskCount AS 'Failed Tasks', killedTaskCount AS 'Killed Tasks'
WHERE event = 'complete'
LIMIT MAX
ORDER BY stageDuration DESC

FROM SparkStage
SELECT sparkAppName as Application, stageId AS 'Stage ID', jobDescription, attemptId AS 'Attempt ID', firstTaskLaunchedTime, completionTime, stageName, details
WHERE event = 'complete' AND status = 'failed'

WITH duration / 1000 AS taskDuration FROM SparkTask
SELECT sparkAppName AS Application, stageId AS 'Stage ID', stageAttemptId AS 'Stage Attempt ID', taskId AS 'Task ID', attemptId AS 'Attempt ID', executorId AS 'Executor ID', status, launchTime, completionTime, schedulerDelay, gettingResultDuration
WHERE event = 'complete'
LIMIT MAX
ORDER BY taskDuration DESC

FROM SparkStage
SELECT rate(sum(inputBytes), 1 second) AS 'Bytes in', rate(sum(inputRecords), 1 second) AS 'Records in', rate(sum(outputBytes), 1 second) AS 'Bytes out', rate(sum(outputRecords), 1 second) AS 'Records out'
WHERE event = 'complete'
TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Average stage shuffle I/O rate per second

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkStage
SELECT rate(sum(shuffleReadBytes), 1 second) AS 'Bytes read', rate(sum(shuffleReadRecords), 1 second) AS 'Records read', rate(sum(shuffleWriteBytes), 1 second) AS 'Bytes written', rate(sum(shuffleWriteRecords), 1 second) AS 'Records written'
WHERE event = 'complete'
TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Average stage memory bytes spilled to disk

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkStage
SELECT average(memorySpilledBytes) AS 'Memory bytes spilled'
WHERE event = 'complete'
TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Average stage disk bytes spilled during shuffles

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkStage
SELECT average(diskSpilledBytes) AS 'Disk bytes spilled'
WHERE event = 'complete'
TIMESERIES

FROM SparkStage
SELECT sparkAppName as Application, stageId AS 'Stage ID', jobDescription, attemptId AS 'Attempt ID', submissionTime, executorDeserializeDuration / 1000 AS 'Deserialize Duration', executorDeserializeCpuDuration / 1000000000 AS 'Deserialize CPU Duration', executorRunDuration / 1000 AS 'Run Duration', executorCpuDuration / 1000000000 AS 'CPU Duration', gcDuration / 1000 AS 'GC Duration', resultSerializationDuration / 1000 AS 'Result Serialization Duration'
WHERE event = 'complete'
LIMIT MAX

FROM SparkTask
SELECT sparkAppName as Application, stageId AS 'Stage ID', stageAttemptId AS 'Stage Attempt ID', taskId AS 'Task ID', attemptId AS 'Attempt ID', launchTime, executorId AS 'Executor ID', executorDeserializeDuration / 1000 AS 'Deserialize Duration', executorDeserializeCpuDuration / 1000000000 AS 'Deserialize CPU Duration', executorRunDuration / 1000 AS 'Run Duration', executorCpuDuration / 1000000000 AS 'CPU Duration', gcDuration / 1000 AS 'GC Duration', resultSerializationDuration / 1000 AS 'Result Serialization Duration'
WHERE event = 'complete'
LIMIT MAX

FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT uniqueCount(executorId) AS Executors

FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT latest(isActive), latest(addTime), latest(coreCount), latest(maxTasks), latest(memoryTotalBytes) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 AS 'Total Memory (GiB)'
FACET sparkAppName AS Application, executorId AS 'Executor ID'

widgets.title: Current executor task counters by application

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT latest(taskCount) AS 'Total Tasks', latest(completedTaskCount) AS 'Completed Tasks', latest(failedTaskCount) AS 'Failed Tasks', latest(taskDuration) / 1000 AS 'Task Duration (s)', latest(gcDuration) / 1000 AS 'GC Duration (s)'
FACET sparkAppName AS Application, executorId AS 'Executor ID'

widgets.title: Storage memory usage by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes)
FACET sparkAppName, executorId
TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Disk usage by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT average(diskUsedBytes)
FACET sparkAppName, executorId
TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Average on-heap storage memory usage by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT average(onHeapMemoryUsedBytes)
FACET sparkAppName, executorId
TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Average on-heap storage memory total by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT average(onHeapMemoryTotalBytes)
FACET sparkAppName, executorId
TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Average off-heap storage memory usage by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT average(offHeapMemoryUsedBytes)
FACET sparkAppName, executorId
TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Average off-heap storage memory total by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT average(offHeapMemoryTotalBytes)
FACET sparkAppName, executorId
TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Current peak on-heap JVM memory usage (MiB) by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT latest(peakJvmHeapMemoryUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024
FACET sparkAppName, executorId

widgets.title: Current peak off-heap JVM memory usage (MiB) by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT latest(peakJvmOffHeapMemoryUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024
FACET sparkAppName, executorId

widgets.title: Current peak on-heap tracked execution memory usage (MiB) by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT latest(peakOnHeapExecutionMemoryUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024
FACET sparkAppName, executorId

widgets.title: Current peak off-heap tracked execution memory usage (MiB) by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT latest(peakOffHeapExecutionMemoryUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024
FACET sparkAppName, executorId

widgets.title: Current peak on-heap storage memory usage (MiB) by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT latest(peakOnHeapStorageMemoryUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024
FACET sparkAppName, executorId

widgets.title: Current peak off-heap storage memory usage (MiB) by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT latest(peakOffHeapStorageMemoryUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024
FACET sparkAppName, executorId

widgets.title: Average RDD blocks by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT average(rddBlockCount)
FACET sparkAppName, executorId
TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Current input bytes (MiB) by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT latest(inputBytes) / 1024 / 1024
FACET sparkAppName, executorId

widgets.title: Current shuffle read bytes (MiB) by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT latest(shuffleReadBytes) / 1024 / 1024
FACET sparkAppName, executorId

widgets.title: Current shuffle write bytes (MiB) by application and executor

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkExecutorSample
SELECT latest(shuffleWriteBytes) / 1024 / 1024
FACET sparkAppName, executorId

FROM SparkRDDSample
SELECT uniqueCount(concat(rddId, rddName)) AS 'RDDs'

FROM SparkRDDDistributionSample
SELECT uniqueCount(concat(rddId, rddName, distributionIndex)) AS 'Distributions'

FROM SparkRDDPartitionSample
SELECT uniqueCount(concat(rddId, rddName, blockName)) AS 'Partitions'

FROM SparkRDDSample
SELECT latest(partitionCount) AS 'Partitions', latest(cachedPartitionCount) AS 'Cached Partitions', average(memoryUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024 AS 'Average Memory Used (MiB)', average(diskUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024 AS 'Average Disk Used (MiB)'
FACET sparkAppName AS Application, rddId AS 'RDD ID', rddName AS 'RDD Name'

widgets.title: Average memory used by application and RDD

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkRDDSample
SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes)
FACET sparkAppName, rddId, rddName 
TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Average disk used by application and RDD

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkRDDSample
SELECT average(diskUsedBytes)
FACET sparkAppName, rddId, rddName
TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Average partition size (MiB) by application and RDD

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkRDDPartitionSample
SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes + diskUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024 AS 'MiB'
FACET sparkAppName, rddId, rddName, blockName

widgets.title: Average distribution size (MiB) by application and RDD

nrqlQueries.query:
FROM SparkRDDDistributionSample
SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes + diskUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024 AS 'MiB'
FACET sparkAppName, rddId, rddName, distributionIndex

FROM SparkRDDPartitionSample
SELECT latest(storageLevel), latest(executorIds) AS 'Executor IDs', average(memoryUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024 AS 'Average Memory Used (MiB)', average(diskUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024 AS 'Average Disk Used (MiB)'
FACET sparkAppName AS Application, rddId AS 'RDD ID', rddName AS 'RDD Name', blockName AS 'Block Name'

FROM SparkRDDDistributionSample
SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024 AS 'Average Memory Used (MiB)', average(diskUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024 AS 'Average Disk Used (MiB)', average(onHeapMemoryUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024 AS 'Average On-heap Memory Used (MiB)', average(offHeapMemoryUsedBytes) / 1024 / 1024 AS 'Average Off-heap Memory Used (MiB)'
FACET sparkAppName AS Application, rddId AS 'RDD ID', rddName AS 'RDD Name', distributionIndex AS 'Distribution Index'
